text: Cliff Jackson (3 September 1941 â€“ 22 May 2018) was an English professional footballer. He was born in Swindon, England. Jackson played as a forward. He made 396 appearances in the Football League for Swindon Town, Plymouth Argyle, Crystal Palace and Torquay United, before moving into non-league football with Cambridge City. Jackson also appeared for England Schoolboys whilst at Swindon Town. ==Personal life== Jackson died on 22 May 2018, aged 76. ==References== ==Other websites== *Cliff Jackson at Plymouth Argyle "Greens on Screen" website *Profile at Swindon Town FC.co.uk Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Association football forwards Category:Crystal Palace F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:People from Swindon Category:Plymouth Argyle F.C. players
title: Cliff Jackson (footballer)
